articles.title: Manappuram Finance posts 37% rise in Q2 profit at ₹561 crore - BusinessLine
articles.description: Manappuram Finance reports 37% increase in net profit to ₹561 crore in Q2 FY24. AUM up 27% to ₹38,950 crore. Non-gold loan businesses account for 47% of AUM. Gross NPA at 1.6%, Net NPA at 1.4%. Consolidated net worth at ₹10,572 crore. Borrowings at ₹32,237 cr…
articles.content:
Manappuram Finance has reported a consolidated net profit at 561 crore in Q2 of FY24 against 410 crore in the corresponding period of the previous fiscal, an increase by 37 per cent.
